records.name: Cocoon Maldives - All Inclusive

descriptions.direction: Located in Ookolhufinolhu, Cocoon Maldives is on the beach. The area's natural beauty can be seen at Palm Island Beach and Kanuhura Beach. Hurawalhi Beach and Kuredu Beach are two other places to visit that come recommended. With windsurfing and swimming nearby, you'll find plenty of adventures in the water.
descriptions.general: General description: The hotel Cocoon Maldives is located around 130 km from Velana International Airport. A sandy beach is in the vicinity of the hotel. At the beach are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge available. In the evening, you can go dancing in a nightclub in the hotel’s surroundings. The airport (MLE) is approx. 132 km away. Amenities: The spa hotel has 150 rooms. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, an air conditioning, a safe (where applicable, for a fee), a shop, discotheque as well as a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 4 restaurants. Concierge service is free of charge. Room service and laundry / ironing service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool with a children´s pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: At the beach different watersport types such as jet skiing and water skiing are available (partly from local providers). Spa area, sauna and massages available (where applicable for a fee). For the entertainment of young guests there is a children´s play area. Child supervision: mini club and babysitting (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Italian. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, American Express and Visa. Beach FamilyVilla (Seaplane Included): With internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Beach Suite (Private Pool - Seaplane): With internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Beach Suite (Seaplane Included): With internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Lagoon Suite (Private Pool - Seaplane): With internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Lagoon Suite (Seaplane Included): With internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Beach Villa (Seaplane Included): With internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Lagoon Villa (Seaplane Included): With internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower.

records.short_description: Excellent beach hotel. Good for sightseeing and has a beach nearby. Awesome vibe. Fantastic service.
